p: In the book “A revised handbook to the Flora of Ceylon [ 7],” four types of plants are mentioned under the genus Tragia. They are Tragia hispida Willd., Tragia involucrata L., Tragia plukenetii Radcliffe-Smith, and Tragia muelleriana Pax and Hoffm. The vernacular name given for Tragia hispida Willd. , Tragia involucrata L., and Tragia plukenetti Radcliffe-Smith are Wel kahambiliya. A vernacular name had not been given to Tragia muelleriana Pax and Hoffm. in Dassanayake and Clayton [ 7].
